definitions.definition: ( uncountable or countable ) A very pungent aromatic spice , the unexpanded flower bud of the clove tree.
( countable ) A clove tree , of the species Syzygium aromaticum (syn. Caryophyllus aromaticus ), native to the Moluccas (Indonesian islands), which produces the spice.
( countable ) An old English measure of weight, containing 7 pounds (3.2 kg), i.e. half a stone .

main_definition: ( uncountable or countable ) A very pungent aromatic spice , the unexpanded flower bud of the clove tree.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A clove tree , of the species Syzygium aromaticum (syn. Caryophyllus aromaticus ), native to the Moluccas (Indonesian islands), which produces the spice.
( countable ) An old English measure of weight, containing 7 pounds (3.2 kg), i.e. half a stone .

definitions.definition: ( horticulture , cooking ) One of the small bulbs formed in the axils of the scales of a large bulb.

main_definition: ( horticulture , cooking ) One of the small bulbs formed in the axils of the scales of a large bulb.

definitions.definition: A narrow valley with steep sides, used in areas of North America first settled by the Dutch

main_definition: ( geography ) A narrow valley with steep sides, used in areas of North America first settled by the Dutch
